dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Crap… We’re out of ammo, too…
It was a clear emergency. The darkly clad children were terrified by an unknown threat with which they didn’t know how to deal.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Dammit… Should’ve known bringing less to save the company budget was a bad call!

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Not like we could earn a better review from HR or anything, so why’d… Ope.
The child’s mouth went shut, for it suddenly dawned on them that their gun had stopped firing its projectiles.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: So this is the end for us…
That’s when their savior appeared, waving her golden-hour hair.

dataList.title: LCCB Assistant Manager
dataList.content: Relax you two. I’ll take charge from here.
With her shield raised, the child stared down her oncoming foe with unwavering resolve.

dataList.title: LCCB Assistant Manager
dataList.content: This is Ishmael. I’ve joined up with the team at Operation Site BA21. Will help them wipe out the damn rats. Over.
Her firearm emitted flashes of light, a semaphore of salvation.

dataList.title: LCCB Assistant Manager
dataList.content: Ah, and also… Please refrain from making idiotic suggestions such as conserving the LCC’s ammo in the future. We have well-heeled sponsors backing us.
